verses.text: A Jehová tz'alan icha tic: Ab'ec val jun tic ex yinhtilal Jacob, ex tze cuch Israel, yinhtilal ex pax Judá. Tze loc in b'i a in Jehová in tic, tzeyalani to tzex och ejmelal d'ayin e Diosal in, palta manh yeloc tzeyala', chab'satil tzex loloni.
Tzeyalani to aj chonhab' ex d'a in chonhab' vicnhej yaji. Tzin eyak'anoch yipoc e k'ool eyalani, a in ton Jehová e Diosal in Yajal in d'a Smasanil.
Ayocto valannaccan yuj tas ix uji tic. A in val ix vak' eyojtaquejeli. Elanhchamel ix laj elk'och tas valnaccan chi'.
Vojtac to te pit ex, max eyiq'uem e b'a, max ex q'uixvi jab'oc d'a vichanh.

Ayocto valannaccan d'ayex ayic manto uji juntzanh tic. Yuj chi' max yal eyalan icha tic yuj juntzanh e comon dios nab'a te', ma q'ueen: A co diosal tic ix naan jun tic, a ix ak'an elk'ochi, manh xe chioc.
A ex tic eyab'nac masanil tas valnaccan chi'. Scham val e naan yuuj, tzeyalaneli to yel valnac. Axo ticnaic ol vak' eyojtaquejel juntzanhxo tas k'ub'eltac yaji, juntzanh manh eyojtacoc.
Aton tas to ato ticnaic svala', manh valnacoc d'a peca', juntzanh tas to malaj b'aj eyab'nac specal yalji masanto ticnaic. Yuj chi' manh ol yal eyalani to eyojtacxo.
Yel toni, a jun tic manta b'aj eyab'nac, manto eyojtacoc, anheja' manto eyab'pax ticnaic. Yujto vojtactaxoni to max e k'anab'ajej, pit ex yictax ex alji.
Palta ay in nivank'olal d'ayex, yuj chi' ix in yamoch vaan yoval in k'ol d'a eyib'anh yuj in b'inajnaquil. Maj ex in sateli yic manh chucoc tz'aj in b'inaji.
Naec to ix ex in sacb'itej, manh ichoc tz'aj q'uen plata d'a cal k'ak', palta aton yed' yaelal ix ex vak' proval.
Yuj vik'jichaanh, icha chi' ex vutej, yic manh chucoc tz'aj yalchaj in b'i. A aloj vach' lolonel smoj yalji d'ayin, max in cha alchaj d'a junocxo, xchi Jehová.
Icha tic yalan Jehová: Ex israel yinhtilal Jacob, ab'ec val tas ol vala': A ex sik'b'il ex el vuuj. A innhej ton Dios in, b'ab'el vaj d'a smasanil, slajvub' in paxi.
A in vak'naccanem lum luum tic d'a yed'tal, in jenhb'annacb'at satchaanh yed' in poder. Tonhej valnac sb'i juntzanh tic, spitzvinacchaanh.

Molb'ejec e b'a e masanil, tzeyab'an tas ol vala': ¿Mach val junoc comon dios ayocto yalannac to a jun vinh vinac sik'b'ilel vuuj, a vinh ol k'ulan masanil tas nab'ilxo vuj d'a yib'anh Babilonia to a yipalil ol satanel eb' caldeo?
A in ol vavtejcot vinh, ol javoc vinh, yalnhej b'aj ol b'at vinh, ol yak'nhej ganar vinh.

Nitzeccot e b'a d'ayin, ab'ec tas ol vala': Yictax ix in yamanoch in lolon d'a eb' anima, k'unnhej snachajel tas svala', axo tz'elk'och tas sval chi', ayinnhej ek' ta', xchi Jehová. A ticnaic jun, checb'il in cot yuj Jehová Yajal, yic tzin lolon yuj spoder Yespíritu.
A Jehová Dios, co Columal a onh israel onh tic Axonhej Ochi, a tz'alan icha tic: A in Jehová e Diosal in, a in tzin ch'ox d'ayex tas ol och e vach'iloc, a in tzin ch'ox b'e b'aj smoj tzex b'ati.
Comonoc val ix e k'anab'ajej in checnab'il, tato icha chi' a vach'ilal tze cha'a tzam q'uenhej chaanh icha a' nivac a' max tupi, axo e colnab'il tzam janhej icha scotnhej b'alaljoc sat a' mar.
Manhxom b'ischajb'enoc eb' eyinhtilal, icha yarenail sti' a' mar. Maj am viq'uemta e b'isul, maj am in b'at mican d'ayex, xchi Jehová.

Syalanxi Jehová icha tic: Elanhec d'a Babilonia, elanhec elelal d'a scal eb' aj Caldea. Alequel jun ab'ix tic yed' av yic tzalajk'olal. Tzeyak'an ojtacajel masanto b'aj slajvik'och yolyib'anhq'uinal tic. Tzeyalan icha tic: A Jehová onh colanel d'a yol sk'ab' Babilonia, a onh yinhtil onh Jacob, aton jun schecab', xe chi, xchi Jehová.
Ayic yek'nac eb' co mam quicham d'a taquinh luum yuj Jehová, manh tacjinacoc sti' eb', yujto a Jehová chi' pojjinac q'uen tenam, yelnaccot chulnaj a' nivac a' sb'eyi.
Axo pax eb' sk'ulan chucal, malaj jab'oc vach'il ol scha eb', xchi Jehová.
